name: Golf 98
description:
Ready your golf-bats you chumps, it's time for the 1998 super golf tournament.

I made this knowing absolutely nothing about golf and for maximum creativity thats the way it should stay. There's only 1 course with 4 holes so far, but should be enough for a taster :) ps. theres no dang sound yet.

So, I haven't made any games 'just for fun' in ages, with my job and life taking up lots of time. Here is my first try at doing something I actually enjoy. If other people enjoy it i'll be adding more courses and fun stuff to it.

I have a little roadmap about possible additions so 'hopefully' I won't be making it up as I go along.
